description: FastStone publishes free and shareware software used to view and convert images and take screen captures. These programs, including Image Viewer, Capture, MaxView, and Photo Resizer, are available from FastStone's website.

Capture and Image Viewer include several FSLANG files, used to change the language in which the programs' UI appears. For example, in FastStone Capture, users can select Settings â†’ Language to change the program's language, using the program's 17 FSLANG files.
